def_cn: 不充分如实的陈述；轻描淡写的说明
def_en: If you say that a statement is an understatement, you mean that it does not fully express the extent to which something is true.

def_cn: 轻描淡写；重事轻说；淡化
def_en: Understatement is the practice of suggesting that things have much less of a particular quality than they really have.
